Maxs Spedition

Max Spedition — your reliable partner in international and domestic freight transportation. We ensure safe, timely delivery and provide comprehensive logistics solutions tailored to your business.

Our services

Часто задаваемые вопросы

How secure is my cargo during transport?
We prioritize safety: using GPS tracking, sealed containers, and industry-standard protection protocols. All shipments are monitored in real-time to ensure safe delivery.
Do you offer free consultations?
Yes, we provide a free initial consultation to understand your needs and suggest the most effective and cost-efficient logistics solution — with no obligations.
Can I track my shipment online?
Absolutely. Our platform allows real-time tracking of your shipments: you can see the location, estimated delivery time, and confirmation of receipt.
What kind of support do you provide?
We offer 24/7 support via phone, chat, and email. Our logistics specialists are always ready to assist with customs clearance, route selection, and urgent requests.
Do you handle international shipping?
Yes, we manage both domestic and international shipments. From customs documentation to last-mile delivery, our global network ensures efficient arrival at the destination.

Contact Us for a Consultation

We will help you find the optimal logistics and transport solutions. Leave your contact details, and our specialist will get in touch for a free consultation.
